## Libraries

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
```

## Read in Data

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
#### inputs:
sample_compare_dir <- "/ix/djishnu/Aaron_F/morgan_satarupa_RNAseq/AM_Results/20250117/DEG_analysis/IL33/pairwise_LFCandPadjust/Unstim_WT_0_Exp1_vs_IL33_WT_24_Exp1"

#### start main
```

## Switch to correct orientation of comparison

```{r}
switch_reference <- TRUE

if (switch_reference) {
  results <- results %>%
    mutate(log2FoldChange = log2FoldChange * -1)
}


```

## format data for plotting
```{r}
df <- results
# Compute -log10(p-value)
df$neg_log_p <- -log10(df$padj)

# Define significance thresholds
logFC_threshold <- log2(1.5)  # Change threshold for up/down regulation
pvalue_threshold <- 0.05

# Classify genes into groups
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    significance = case_when(
      log2FoldChange > logFC_threshold & padj < pvalue_threshold ~ "Up",
      log2FoldChange < -logFC_threshold & padj < pvalue_threshold ~ "Down",
      TRUE ~ "Not Sig"
    )
  )

# Select top significant genes for labeling
# Define the threshold for labeling
logFC_threshold <-2.5  # Adjust if needed
neg_log_p_threshold <- 30

# Identify genes to label
df$label <- ifelse(abs(df$log2FoldChange) > logFC_threshold | df$neg_log_p > neg_log_p_threshold, df$Geneid, "")

# # Create a subset of labeled points
# labeled_df <- df[abs(df$log2FoldChange) > logFC_threshold | df$neg_log_p > neg_log_p_threshold, ]

# add in Arg1
df <- df %>%
  mutate(label = case_when(
    Geneid == "Arg1" ~ Geneid,  # Ensure Arg1 is always labeled
    label != "" ~ label,        # Keep previous labels
    TRUE ~ ""                   # Ensure other entries are empty, not NA
  ))



```

```{r}
pdf("Unstim_vs_IL33_WT_volcano_plot.pdf")

# Get symmetric x-axis limits
max_abs_logFC <- max(abs(df$log2FoldChange), na.rm = TRUE)

# Define limits
x_limits <- c(-max_abs_logFC, max_abs_logFC)
y_limits <- c(0, max(df$neg_log_p, na.rm = TRUE))

# Create volcano plot with square aspect ratio
ggplot(df, aes(x = log2FoldChange, y = neg_log_p, color = significance)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 2) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Down" = "blue", "Not Sig" = "gray", "Up" = "red")) +
  
  # Main labeling with geom_text_repel (excluding Arg1)
  geom_text_repel(aes(label = ifelse(label == "Arg1", "", label)), 
                  size = 3, box.padding = 0.3, max.overlaps = 16) +

  # Manually add Arg1 with a label offset and a connecting line
  geom_text_repel(data = df %>% filter(Geneid == "Arg1"),
                  aes(label = "Arg1", color = significance),
                  size = 3, nudge_x = 1.5, nudge_y = 1.5,  # Adjust offset
                  segment.color = "red", segment.size = 0.5) +  # Add connecting line

  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "right",
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    axis.line = element_line()
  ) +
  labs(x = "log2FC", y = "-log10(P)", title = "Unstim vs IL33 WT") +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 0.17, xlim = x_limits, ylim = y_limits)




dev.off()

```
